W15_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world choked by stagnant air on the other side of the door. What looked like the Vermillion Bird was just a discharge of smoke.

W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_EVAR_MIDO_KA_100_DETAIL.text: There should be a spirit in this cave. Better secure it fast and get out of this place.

W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: Head to the Heavens in search of a door that'll lead you to your next spirit.

W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W15_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_030_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. Time to head back to the Heavens and search for the door to Miyako City.
